data.name: Like an Angel
data.detailed_description:
"Like an Angel" is a boy love game for adults, it has simulation and interactive fiction elements. It has more than 7 endings and plenty of CG for the player to explore.

In the year 2025, because of the climate abnormality, Taipei's streets are very cold. Mufan, who is a male succubus child "Mabuu", came to this city secretly.
According to the demon rules, you need to take the challenge of living in the human world for 13 weeks by yourself in order to turn into an adult succubus.
But there are a lot of hard parts for a demon to live in the human world, like money and a place to call home. Thank god Mabuu looks almost the same as humans. They
can also use magic to avoid some troubles. Working hard on part-time jobs for a living and for Mabuu's physiological needs of finding targets to absorb the essence. After meeting plenty of different people, what dramatic changes will come to Mufan's trial?

Chacter






Production team：OTERAS（放logo）
Producer：星野和真
Lead artist：白夜BYA
Programmer：兔姬
Narrative leader：瀝青
Art director：Nekona
Chibi artist：乂布四維
BGM composer：Nyubor
Background artist：陳國豪
Background artist：Zingco Kang
Item artist：兎未枝
Item artist：PichiＭa
Project assistant：伽紅素
Translator：Soyu
Translator：JT
Other：浮生夜叉

The theme song：《Like an Angel》
lyricist：薛南
Composer：計畫通行
Singer：計畫通行
PV maker：巧依

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Monterey 12.1
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Monterey 12.1
  • Processor: intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

movies.name: 《Like an Angel》首發PV──那年冬季，來自魔界卻形同天使的你

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains male and male sexual behaviors, descriptions of sexual organs, and slightly violent plots. Please play with it carefully.
